articles.title: Texas Floods Kill at Least 82 People, with Dozens Still Missing and More Rains Forecast
articles.description: Catastrophic flooding in central Texas has resulted in at least 82 deaths, with dozens still missing. The most affected area, Kerr County, reported significant casualties, including children from Camp Mystic. Rescue operations are ongoing as more rain is expected.

articles.title: Rubio Meets China’s Wang Yi as Trade Tensions Grow
articles.description: U.S. Secretary of State Marco Rubio met with Chinese Foreign Minister Wang Yi in Kuala Lumpur amid escalating trade tensions. The meeting aimed to position the U.S. as a more reliable partner in Asia compared to China.

articles.title: US & Russia Hold Fresh Talks on Ukraine at ASEAN
articles.description: Russian Foreign Minister Sergey Lavrov and U.S. Secretary of State Marco Rubio met at the ASEAN foreign ministers’ meeting in Malaysia to discuss new approaches to reviving peace efforts in Ukraine.
